content: description the stony shore cardigan will be your new favorite sweater it s beginner friendly and a breeze to make it features a beautiful stitch repeat for amazing texture and balloon style sleeves the sleek pockets are the perfect touch on your new cardigan this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is a kit on lion brand 2 the kit comes with the digital pdf pattern + all the yarn you need to make your own you can even customize your color choice this pattern has a full video tutorial on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-stony-shore-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3caqh 3 https //youtu be/v6vppusq6-8
